content: Hi, I want to change my shipping address for my quote.
I'd be happy to help you update your shipping address. To get started, could you please provide me with your quote ID so I can look up your details?
Now that I have your quote ID, what changes would you like to make to your shipping address?
Sorry, the correct one is 654321. The new address is Pine Street, San Francisco

I have updated the quote with the new address. Please confirm that the quote ID is 654321 and the new address is Pine Street, San Francisco, but I need to confirm that the other information such as Country, City, Street, Door Number, Postal Code, State is the same as the previous one.
I can only help with updating quote information. I don't have any information about payment methods. I can help with your quote, though. Please provide me with the correct information to update.
